overview: When our stud sees cute babe Serena Avery walking by in the parking lot, he has to go fishing for some pussy.  Sweet blonde Natalie Knight is walking around in some skin tight clothes when our stud pulls up alongside her in a big truck.  After I decide to take a long drive down the highway, the last thing I expect to find is a beautiful teen like Spencer Bradley hanging out on the side of the road.  Meeting a tatted-up cutie like Isabel Moon stranded on the side of the road doesn't happen every day, so you bet your ass I'm going to offer her a ride home.
title: My Daddy's Point Of View 10
